articles.author: Sy Mukherjee
articles.title: AstraZeneca stock slips on mixed earnings report and coronavirus uncertainty
articles.description: Shares of British drug giant AstraZeneca fell nearly 4% in Friday trading on a mixed earnings report and coronavirus uncertainty in China.

articles.author: Aaron Pressman
articles.title: ‘There will be MWC in Barcelona next year,’ mobile trade show group vows after canceling this year’s event
articles.description: After this year's gathering was cancelled due to the coronavirus outbreak, the organizer vowed to return to the city next year.

articles.author: Lucinda Shen
articles.title: As coronavirus spreads, even furniture sellers in the U.S. are starting to feel the fallout
articles.description: “Ultimately, if this continues for an extended period of time, it may accomplish much more quickly what the tariffs intended to do, and force retailers into moving their sourcing to other countries, even the United States,” predicts one analyst.

articles.author: Grady McGregor
articles.title: Adding infections, subtracting deaths: What to make of China’s fluctuating coronavirus count
articles.description: There are pros and cons to this week's wild swings in data.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: President Xi Jinping’s pick to fix Wuhan’s coronavirus crisis: The man who lured Tesla to China
articles.description: Ex-Shanghai Mayor Ying Yong, 62, was appointed Thursday to the top political post in central Hubei province, whose capital is the coronavirus-ravaged city of Wuhan.

articles.author: Ian Mount
articles.title: China finds promising coronavirus treatment in blood plasma from recovered patients
articles.description: China National Biotec Group claimed that 10 seriously ill patients receiving the treatment improved within 24 hours, with reduced inflammation and viral loads along with better oxygen levels in the blood.

articles.author: Karen Yuan
articles.title: Strong dollar, cheap oil—the twin shocks that could roil markets well beyond coronavirus
articles.description: The IEA slashed its 2020 oil outlook, and the dollar is soaring. It's reminding some analysts of 2008.

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: ‘It’s a better gift than wine now:’ Coronavirus makes toilet paper a hot new currency
articles.description: 'It’s a better gift than wine now.'

articles.author: Claire Zillman, reporter
articles.title: A cruise industry crisis: No one wants to be stuck on the next coronavirus-hit ship
articles.description: Fears are especially acute in Asia, which was supposed to be a growth market.
